name: Rev. Fr. John Doe
title: Pastor
bio: Fr. John has been the shepherd of St. Peter The Apostle - Airport Parish since 2022. He is dedicated to fostering a vibrant and prayerful community.

name: Deacon Michael Smith
title: Permanent Deacon
bio: Deacon Michael assists the parish with liturgical functions, charitable works, and faith formation. He has been a beloved member of the parish for over 15 years.
